Span.Tab1: Grab your favorites from other browsers and see them in the Hub .
Span.Tab2: With Windows Defender and SmartScreen technology in Microsoft Edge, your PC is already protected from malicious software, websites, and downloads.
Span.Tab3: Personalise Microsoft Edge with popular extensions like Pinterest's Pin It button, Amazon Assistant, AdBlock, Adblock Plus, LastPass and more.

AriaLabel.AriaLabel1: Welcome to Microsoft Edge. Let's get you set up. One. Import your favorites. Two. Surf safely. Three. Customize with extensions.
AriaLabel.AriaLabel2: Favorites folder Illustration. One. Import your favorites. Grab your favorites from other browsers and see them in the Hub icon.
AriaLabel.AriaLabel3: Safety shield illustration. Two. Surf safely. With Windows Defender and SmartScreen technology in Microsoft Edge, your PC is already protected from malicious software, websites, and downloads.
AriaLabel.AriaLabel4: Extensions Illustration. Three. Customize with extensions. Personalize Microsoft Edge with popular extensions like Pinterest's Pin It button, Amazon Assistant, AdBlock, Adblock Plus, LastPass, and more.
AriaLabel.AriaLabel5: You're good to go. Want more tips? Click below to see what's new with Microsoft Edge.
